text.english: You have given a banner to those who fear You, That it may be displayed because of the truth.Selah That Your beloved may be delivered, Save with Your right hand, and hear me.
text.arabic: أَعْطَيْتَ خَائِفِيكَ رَايَةً تُرْفَعُ لأَجْلِ الْحَقِّ. سِلاَهْ. لِكَيْ يَنْجُوَ أَحِبَّاؤُكَ. خَلِّصْ بِيَمِينِكَ وَاسْتَجِبْ لِي.
